context: Etsy, Inc. is a e-commerce marketplace for handmade and vintage goods focused on artisan marketplace, unique items, and creative entrepreneurship. Unique goods marketplace. Competing with Amazon Handmade, eBay.

competitors.name: Amazon
competitors.notes: E-commerce giant with Handmade and endless selection

competitors.name: eBay
competitors.notes: Marketplace for collectibles, vintage, and unique goods

competitors.name: Shopify
competitors.notes: Platform for independent sellers and brands

competitors.name: Faire
competitors.notes: B2B wholesale marketplace for independent retailers
